channel.title: Autojoin Black Mesa chat Group
channel.description:
Found this little neat shortcut trick today.
Create a shortcut of steam.exe, set it's target to: D:\Steam\Steam.exe [b]steam://friends/joinchat/103582791429535324[/b]
Either use it whenever you want or use [b]"run" + shell :s tartup[/b] and place the shortcut there. Voilá, automagic autojoin of the chat, instead of doing it manually like a peasant.

item.title: Autojoin Black Mesa chat Group
item.dc:creator: LordDz
item.description:
Found this little neat shortcut trick today.

Create a shortcut of steam.exe, set it’s target to: D:\Steam\Steam.exe steam://friends/joinchat/103582791429535324

Either use it whenever you want or use “run” + shell :s tartup and place the shortcut there.
Voilá, automagic autojoin of the chat, instead of doing it manually like a peasant.
